data.what_is:
Bumbl is an omnichannel marketing automation tool that helps businesses in setting personalized and targeted campaigns to increase lead generation through Push Notifications, In-app Messages, SMS, Web Push, Emails, WhatsApp, Facebook, and more!
Maximize your ROI by nurturing the leads through personalized customer experience as per the segments, with the right communication strategy observing the demographics, customer behavior, and much more.
data.product_description:
Bumbl is an omnichannel marketing automation tool that helps businesses in setting personalized and targeted campaigns to increase lead generation through Push Notifications, In-app Messages, SMS, Web Push, Emails, WhatsApp, Facebook, and more!
Maximize your ROI by nurturing the leads through personalized customer experience as per the segments, with the right communication strategy observing the demographics, customer behavior, and much more.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bumbl?
Bumbl does away with marketing problems and makes it much easier to reach the target audience. We can convey any info to the user at any given time, whether it be SMS, push notifications or emails.

What do you dislike about Bumbl?
The product is still not mainstream and needs a holistic documentation available to the users of it. Furthermore, it would have privacy issues in the long run.
It should have an option to filter out users.

Recommendations to others considering Bumbl:
If your a new online business and trying to make a profit, I would recommend to give Bumbl a shot.

What problems is Bumbl solving and how is that benefiting you?
Identify users who might need an extra push or who can be targeted to be followed up by the seller to ensure that the consumer is happy and in turn puts down a good order on their website.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bumbl?
Has the basics for anyone who wants to establish a proper marketing plan for small and medium businesses lacking the know-how of fundamental marketing techniques. Great start for digital marketing for traditional brick-and-mortar businesses.

What do you dislike about Bumbl?
Though it has a holistic approach to marketing campaigns will need to develop a FAQ on features to be more user-friendly for nontech/social media savvy users and first-time users.

What problems is Bumbl solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated marketing campaigns with the review. Lead generation. Segmented targeting made easy. Time and cost-saving results in more productive time spent on customer satisfaction and better bottom lines.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best platform to increase customer base
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bumbl?
Simple platform to partner to enhance customer base.
They provide simple yet very effective solution.

What do you dislike about Bumbl?
It takes a while for the results of collaboration to come into effect.

What problems is Bumbl solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bumbl is solving one of the cruciL problem of enhancing customer base.
In the initial stage of any business, one of the greatest challenge is to gather the customer base.
Bumbl do it so well with strategies ranging from simple marketing to advances techniques

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Bumbl?
As far i guess so that genuine profiles are there for about 70%.
Their suggestions are also good to go.

What do you dislike about Bumbl?
Sometime it lags but most of the time works smoothly.

What problems is Bumbl solving and how is that benefiting you?
Online dating and all.
